description: Lists all tags associated with a given Amazon Translate resource. For more information, see Tagging your resources.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the given Amazon Translate resource you are querying.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Tags associated with the Amazon Translate resource being queried. A tag is a key-value pair that adds as a metadata to a resource used by Amazon Translate. For example, a tag with 'Sales' as the key might be added to a resource to indicate its use by the sales department.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The second part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.
